modmenu.descriptionTranslation.pas: Now the armor stands look like players... but don't forget to rename them for that
commands.pas.reload_failed_error: To reload the skin, you must specify a player name
commands.pas.skin_not_found: Can't find data for specified skin
pas.buttons.configurator.tooltip: Open the Player Armor Stand Configurator to manage skin and its parameters
pas.config.show_armor_stand_while_downlo: Show Armor Stand Model While Downloading
pas.config.try_apply_from_server_player: Try to Apply Skin from Server Player
pas.menu.name: Armor Stand Configurator
pas.menu.tab.cape.name: Cape name / ID
pas.menu.tab.cape.name.tooltip: To download Cape from NameMC you should specify cape ID. For example, in "https://namemc.com/cape/cb5dd34bee340182" id is "cb5dd34bee340182"
pas.menu.tab.skin.name: Name / ID
pas.menu.tab.skin.name.tooltip: To download a skin from Mojang's servers, simply enter the player's name. For NameMC, copy the skin ID from the website (for example, in "https://namemc.com/skin/4da4ce379e8b0d00" the skin ID will be "4da4ce379e8b0d00") and paste it into the field below. Only AFTER entering the skin source and Name / ID should you press Enter or the button to the right of the input field.
pas.menu.tab.cape.label: Show Cape
pas.menu.tab.overlay.name: Overlay texture
pas.menu.tab.overlay.name.tooltip: In the field below, specify any name of texture located in assets/minecraft/textures/blocks (e.g. stone)
pas.menu.tab.overlay.display_name.toolti: Name from box below will be displayed instead player name. To apply name, you should press enter
pas.rp.3d_items_with_head.desc: Item model with dynamic head for Player Armor Stands mod
pas.rp.3d_items_player_like.desc: Item model with player skin for Player Armor Stands mod
pas.yacl_required.1: To configure this mod, you need to install Yet Another Config Lib (YACL).
pas.yacl_required.2: Please download it from Modrinth to continue!
